chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: PMB is a highly configurable application. Parameters linked to readers, statistical processes, operations of the Z39.50 client, all can be customized.
Moreover, the administration tab allows multiple database-related functions, like optimizing the database tables, or routine PMB operations like user management (librarians).

The administration tab, in addition to its importance, has more screens than any other PMB tab. For this reason, we have decided to introduce this guide separately to facilitate the update of the information presented here.

sect1.title: About PMB
sect1.para: PMB is a free integrated library management software. For more information, refer to http://www.sigb.net .

sect1.title: Organization of the Administration Tab
sect1.para: The administration tab has a menu located on the left hand side of the screen, and within each of the various sub-menus there is a links bar located on top on the screen.
